statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_energy_consumption;
SELECT plant_name, energy_consumption_kwh FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM packaging_energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_consumption_kwh DESC;
SELECT plant_name, production_date FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumption_kwh > 500;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, energy_consumption_kwh, production_date FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumption_kwh > 5000 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT plant_name, SUM(energy_consumption_kwh) AS total_energy_consumption FROM packaging_energy_consumption GROUP BY plant_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01' AND production_date < '2021-12-31' AND energy_consumption_kwh BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, energy_consumption_kwh, production_date FROM packaging_energy_consumption WHERE plant_name LIKE '%Packaging%' ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants
SELECT plant_name, city FROM packaging_plants WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT plant_id, city, country FROM packaging_plants WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, city, country FROM packaging_plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT plant_name, city, country FROM packaging_plants WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE year=2021 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT plant_name, city FROM packaging_plants WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA';
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC, city DESC;
SELECT plant_name, city, year FROM packaging_plants JOIN energy_consumption ON packaging_plants.plant_id = energy_consumption.plant_id WHERE year=2022;
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM packaging_plants WHERE total_energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_records ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT type_name, material_type FROM packaging_types WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT plant_name, total_energy_consumption FROM packaging_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM packaging_plants WHERE total_energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT SUM(total_energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM packaging_plants;

SELECT plant_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM packaging_plants JOIN energy_consumption_records ON packaging_plants.plant_id = energy_consumption_records.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM packaging_types WHERE recyclable = TRUE ORDER BY type_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Packaging_Plants WHERE energy_consumption > 500;
SELECT plant_name, energy_consumption FROM Packaging_Plants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Production_Lines ORDER BY line_capacity DESC;

SELECT product_name, line_name, plant_name FROM Products JOIN Production_Lines ON Products.line_id = Production_Lines.line_id JOIN Packaging_Plants ON Production_Lines.plant_id = Packaging_Plants.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM Packaging_Plants WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT product_name, line_name, plant_name FROM Products p JOIN Production_Lines pl ON p.line_id = pl.line_id JOIN Packaging_Plants pp ON pl.plant_id = pp.plant_id;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumed FROM Packaging_Plants;
SELECT product_name, date, energy_consumed FROM Products p JOIN Energy_Usage eu ON p.product_id = eu.product_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location FROM packaging_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM packaging_plants;
SELECT plant_name, production_date, total_output FROM packaging_plants JOIN packaging_production ON packaging_plants.plant_id = packaging_production.plant_id;
SELECT plant_id, source_name, energy_consumed FROM plant_energy_sources JOIN energy_sources ON plant_energy_sources.source_id = energy_sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_plants WHERE total_energy_consumed > 5000 ORDER BY plant_id DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM packaging_plants WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT production_date, total_output FROM packaging_production WHERE total_output < 1000 ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT plant_name, source_name FROM packaging_plants JOIN plant_energy_sources ON packaging_plants.plant_id = plant_energy_sources.plant_id JOIN energy_sources ON plant_energy_sources.source_id = energy_sources.source_id WHERE energy_consumed > 2000 ORDER BY plant_name ASC;

SELECT plant_name, maintenance_date, details FROM packaging_plants JOIN maintenance_logs ON packaging_plants.plant_id = maintenance_logs.plant_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
